vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Angela Hickman Scott, Alvin'a Scott, Alvin Scott Jr. and Andrew Scott, of approximately 11,826 square feet of land located near the intersection of University Hill Boulevard and Camp Wisdom Road for the University Hills Infrastructure Project - Not to exceed $9,990.00 ($8,900.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $1,090.00) - Financing: Equity Revitalization Capital Fund
